newsTiles.headline: First Responders
newsTiles.body: RSET turns 3D Scans into highly immersive simulations where high risk events can be safely replicated for pre-visualization and after action review.

newsTiles.headline: Litigation and Trial
newsTiles.body: Donâ€™t settle for static, single perspective animations or videos. With RSET, the jury can re-live the incident in question.

newsTiles.headline: Gaming in Your Scan
newsTiles.body: RSET turns your 3D environment into a zombie survival game.

newsTiles.headline: Scenario Service
newsTiles.body: Do you want custom crafted scenarios in your environment but don't want to do it yourself? We can help! RSET will create any scenarios you need.
